full_text:
Re: Epstein status hearing
From
To Darrin Howard,
Date 2019/08/28 08:05
Subject: Re: Epstein status hearing
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Thanks [redacted]. This is extremely well-done. I am going to share this with the Regional Executive Assistant.
[redacted]
Deputy Regional Counsel
Federal Bureau of Prisons
Northeast Region
US Custom House, 7th Floor
2nd & Chestnut Streets
Philadelphia, PA
215-521 [redacted]
267-443 [redacted] (cell)

> [redacted] 8/27/2019 6:26 PM >>>
Hi Darrin [redacted]
At Judge Berman's invitation, I went to the hearing in Epstein's case this morning. As you likely know, the government had asked the court to grant their request for a nolle pros. At the start of the hearing, Judge Berman said he was using the hearing as an opportunity for the victims to be heard. He then gave the government and defense counsel a chance to speak.
[redacted]
Most importantly, defense counsel stated they were "all for finding out the truth!" To that end, they asked
Page 1240
DOJ-OGR-00023596

At Judge Berman's invitation, I went to the hearing in Epstein's case this morning. As you likely know, the government had asked the court to grant their request for a nolle pros. At the start of the hearing, Judge Berman said he was using the hearing as an opportunity for the victims to be heard. He then gave the government and defense counsel a chance to speak.
